title: Another Disaster for the Democrats! (Ep 1190)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing lowlights from last night’s Democrat debate. I also address eye-opening new connections between the players involved in the framing of Lt. General Mike Flynn. Finally, I debunk Bernie Sanders’s lies about Cuba and socialism. 

News Picks:Why Bernie Sanders’s praise of Fidel Castro matters. 
 
Debunking liberal lies about Cuba.
 
Bernie Sanders is lying about Cuba.
 
Twenty things to know about Bernie Sanders.
 
President Trump’s appointments to the Nutty Ninth Circuit are already paying dividends.
 
Who set up Lt. General Mike Flynn?
 
Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
